author: bharath.vedartham
content:
Hey folks, picking up from yesterday's call. I updated PR: https://github.com/ethereum/builder-specs/pull/144 to only specify the various configuration per builder configuration parameters like min-bid, bid-boost etc and a bid selection strategy on how the winning bid is selected from a list of bids. For now we have only defined `max_profit` which is basically the bid with the highest value. 
How a client does muxes across builders/relays is an impl detail which doesn't have to be spec'ed out. 
I believe it makes sense to standardize these parameters across clients for a better block auction across proposers and builders

author: bharath.vedartham
content: I think we can be flexible in how these parameters can be implemented. We could either implement them in clients or via a sidecar if desired.
